name: Flesh_World
text:
Flesh World
 
 
Flesh World was a magazine mainly featuring contact ads. Subscribers make contact with each other through responding to an ad by writing to the magazine. Laura Palmer, Ronette Pulaski, Leo Johnson, Teresa Banks and possibly Jacques Renault have made use of the magazine.
Behind the scenes
The title of the magazine in the original script for the pilot episode was Sex Toys: Swingers, Coast-to-Coast.
In The Secret Diary of Laura Palmer, it is called Fleshworld in one word.
